GSD.product_version: versions from v5.5 to before v5.10.140
GSD.description:
nfc: pn533: Fix use-after-free bugs caused by pn532_cmd_timeout

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.140 by commit 50403ee6daddf0d7a14e9d3b51a377c39a08ec8c, it was introduced in version v5.5 by commit c656aa4c27b17a8c70da223ed5ab42145800d6b5. For more details please see the references link.
